response_from_owner_text: Thanks for joining us! We know the line can be rough at times, but we are so thankful for all of our guests and hope everyone has a great Holiday Season.

review_text: Let s start by saying that the line was 2 hours long! Food was delicious but I don t believe anyone should wait this long at all. They don t take reservations, I think this should change to avoid this ridiculous waiting time in the cold On top of that they seated another group before us which made us have to wait more this was not nice. Then when seated the waiter did not even approach us and was more worried about the other tables tipping him since they were paying. One of the workers noticed and decided to serve us himself and bless him he was the nicest and most caring person! Glad that it got turned around. We ended up getting complementary cocktails and they were both very nice. You pay $28 and there s only skirt steak on the menu with unlimited fries. The skirt steak was cooked to perfection and the fries were unlimited and delicious, you also get salad and bread. After that there s a dessert cart with many options. We tried the key lime pie and loved it. Overall food 10/10 but they have to work on some of the workers and the lines outside.
response_from_owner_text: Claudia, Thank you so much for the feedback. We unfortunately cannot control the line or peoples interest in dining with us, especially after the TikTok coverage, but we are sorry you had to spend time in line. However, we are looking into digital wait lists to help during winter months. We are not intending on taking reservations at this time, and we offer our tables based on what party sizes we can accommodate. If a party of 4 opens up, we ask for the next party of 4 in line to come in. This is the same with bar seating and parties of two. As for the team, we are continuously working to improve service, and we will absolutely look into what happened during your experience. Best regards, The Skirt Steak Team
Thanks so much! We are so happy you enjoyed everything.

review_text: I had a great experience here! Steaks were amazing - very juicy, tender, and with rich flavor, but at the same time not too much. Even sides were extremely well made, both the salad and the fries. Ended up having 3 portions of fries. I got the Apple Negroni, which was okay, nothing exceptional. The service was on top too. We waited in the line for about 25 minutes, and was totally worth it!
response_from_owner_text: Thanks so much for the review and the feedback. We will definitely look into it.

review_text: Really long line but took far too long seating people when the restaurant opened. Tons of tables but people were still standing in the cold! $10 bread stick!? Never again! Service was not good at all as well. I personally was not happy with my experience...
My daughter found this place and we ate here our last night in the city. Great staff, excellent cocktails, and for $28? Was it worth the hour wait in line out in the cold? Yeaaa boyyyy!!!

After queuing for an hour and a half, we were ultimately disappointed in the meal. The steak is a cheap cut, not surprising given the price, but it was still disappointing. The waitstaff were friendly enough, but lacked attention. At no point we were asked if we would like an additional drink, only water on arrival. It then took far too long to bring the cheque over to us, and then take payment from that point. The main grievance is that after 90 minutes of waiting, we did not feel we got a satisfactory dining experience. To those waiting in line, I would suggest they go elsewhere if the queue is too long.

Nice place,affordable prices, Food overall is really good, im giving them 4 stars, because salad is kind of meh, Steak is really good, but i think they use way to much salt, the dressing for the steak really good, also get the garlic bread is amazing. and go early big line
response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the feedback! Well work on that salad for you and make sure its better next time.

review_text: Went there 2 weeks ago for a Sunday brunch because everywhere else was too busy, and guess what, we were so glad we came in!!! It is a pre-fixed menu but it s so well done! Really good! And please take a dessert you d be surprised.
response_from_owner_text: Thank you Em!  Were so happy to here you enjoyed our steak and desserts.  We look forward to taking care of you again in the future.

review_text: Came at 1pm. Lights were on but no one presented. Door was locked and no one answered the phone. Several people waited outside and left. Is there an updated time?Took an hour transit time try this place. Reading all the reviews about it not being run well makes sense. Would definitely change reviews if it s ever open.

Very. Very. Long wait. The reviews are biased to lower scores, because after 1.5 hours of waiting in line in freezing weather, peoples view is skewed but its not the restaurants fault that there are long lines! The steak is really good but its a single-item restaurant and steak is subjective: the steak is charred on the outside giving it a charcoal-ish taste. I loved it, but some people dont. The fries are OK, bar is OK, desserts are adequate. And you HAVE to get the garlic bread, its  AMAZING!
response_from_owner_text: Thanks so much Iman for your review.  We appreciate the honest feedback and am happy to hear that you enjoy the steak!  We think our steak is perfect for everybody but your right - not everyone is going to love that charred exterior.  Well work on our desserts so next time theyre way above adequate but exceptional.

review_text: the food was REALLY good and the servers were very attentive. only thing is be ready to wait awhile, we were outside for nearly 2 hours
response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the review - the line can be a very long.  Appreciate you taking the time to come visit us.

review_text: The experience wasnt so bad, the steak was tender but my main note is that it is heavily burnt that I had the taste of charcoal in my mouth. The fries was fair and the sauce is so simple. I will never stand 2 hours again for this restaurant and dont suggest anyone to do so, some other restaurants with same price has a better tasting steak.
response_from_owner_text: Sorry to hear you didnt enjoy our style of steak.  We cook it in extremely high temperatures to create a flavorful char on the outside.  Im sorry to hear the wait in line was that long - hopefully when it dies down you can come in and give us another chance.

review_text: First off I ll start by saying I heard of this spot through tik tok and wanted to see if it lived up to the hype. My husband and I arrived around 6pm and didn t get in till 8pm due to the long line down the block (be prepared for that). Despite the long line we had a great time. Upon entering you are greeted, seated and immediately get service which was great. The food came out so fast and was delicious! We both got well done steak with the fries and garlic bread (a must have). Service was great and the dessert cart was also a plus! You definitely get a great value for the price. I would certainly recommend giving it a try.

This place is elite. Incredible restaurant, service, food, staff and value. Saw some crazy people leave negative reviews and almost didn t come as a result. Glad we did: We got there around 10pm on a Thursday, though it was unlikely we d be seated and instead were welcomed extremely warmly, got to hear some of the background story on how the place stumbled into success and see why (eat why) firsthand. I have not found a better value for a fun dinner out in nyc to date.

Not worth it for some sub par steak that they didnt even cook to my temperature right charred to the end and straight raw in middle when I asked for medium and fries that made you wish you had just went to McDonalds. The staff was nice and dessert wasnt bad but for $50 after-tax it wasnt anything to rave about. Can get a better cut at outback says alot.

Had an awesome meal at Skirt Steak last night! I had seen this restaurant via a viral TikTok and it definitely lived up to the hype. We got there around 7:30 on a Monday and had to wait just under an hour to get in. Once you sit down, you re presented with a drink menu, but no food menu it s printed on your table! $28 for bread, salad, skirt steak, and unlimited fries. It s an awesome deal and you won t leave hungry. The salad was large and had a delicious dressing, and was served with fresh baguette and butter. Ask for the garlic bread (if they still have any they tend to run out as the night goes on). After salad, they bring over your steak, which can be cooked rare, medium, or well done (we found the medium to be closest to medium rare, if that s what you re looking for). The skirt steak is served with a really great sauce as well as unlimited French fries (they ll come around and ask you if you want more!) For anyone that isn t familiar with skirt steak, it s become increasingly popular (and expensive) over the past few years and is prized for its tenderness and great flavor. You can also get a side of some vegetables (they had spinach and Brussels sprouts when we went, the spinach was great), though that s an additional charge on top of the base $28. Super friendly service and it seems like they re just as excited as the customers about what they re doing, made for a great experience. Couldn t recommend this place more and I ll definitely be back!

Read about them on many food review of new restaurant sites. All positives reviews which got us curious about this place... We finally got the chance during this busy holidays season, and pleasantly this place didnt disappoint! Clean, cute, friendly, efficient, delicious, quick, great value are some adjectives that come to mind. If youre a meat lover served with a side of endless hot fries, this is your place!
Very average experience :(
The manager was super nice. Food was great, drinks were amazing. Everything was good except the salad but you dont even mind that after a great service and food. Thank you so much

Love the concept! Steak is only available in Rare, Medium and Well. Since I would normally order Med-Well, the server recommended the Well, as it would still have a little red. Well, it did not - in fact, it was charred. But no worries, our server promptly put in an order for Medium and it came out perfect. Unlimited fries and a salad accompanied the main dish, but you can also order spinach or brussles. A great price point and package for under 30$, but you can definitely run up the tab with drinks and dessert. Great drinks. Service was a little spotty due to an influx in patrons - likely from viewing a viral tiktok video (which is how I found the place).

coming from Dallas Texas where they have real food!, bad choice!!! Awful !!! Waiting for 2 hours, then other 30 minutes inside to have a plate served with lettuce , no flavor,  no nothing on it just lettuce, after 20 minutes a really small piece of skirt and  some greasy fries!!! No condiments, no nothing!! then the ticket !!!very unpleasant, very disappointed, !! Overpriced for the amount of food!!! Go to macdonals insted, basically the same , well cheaper!!      please , please, please don t believe in TikTok!! Just marketing!!! I will never go back!!!

saw it on tik tok. was hyped. the place is definitely over hyped. save yours self from the wait, applebees has better steaks. they start you out with some bread, for a party of six we got one tiny slice of bread each. then we were given a salad, with  a off putting dressing. after the salad, the steaks took more than 30 mins to come to us.  the steak was chewy, burnt in most places, and not cooked how i wanted it. we didn t bother to try the dessert, seeing as how the main course was a mediocre steak at best.

I was also one of the TikTok dummies that decided to come in and give this place a try, and all I can say is AVOID. As soon as I walked in I was told there was a 15 minute wait, even through the restaurant was half empty and all but two of the 20+ bar seats were open. When I asked if I could just sit at the bar, they hedged back and forth and finally said yes. I learned this would soon be a consistent approach as I was sat by the door, overhearing others come in. Each person coming in was given wildly different answers as they came in. The red-headed bartender (never shared her name) was initially alone behind the bar, so we cut her some slack. However absolute disinterest was the only thing she served us without an exorbitant wait. Were talking 20+ minutes for a requested water refill. We ordered our food after sitting there more than 30 minutes, and bread and salad came pretty quickly. Standard, boring, Golden Corral level of fare. It then took over 45 minutes after the salads to get out steaks. I finally asked the bartender because two people that had come in an hour after us got their food first. She went to the kitchen, and clearly our steaks had been given to others at the bar. The steak itself was cooked well temperature wise for medium. It was crusted with so much salt, I assume to try and tenderize it, that it was nearly inedible. The fries were hit or miss, with half of them being oily and soggy. If youre only going to offer three things on your menu, you need to execute them perfectly. Save yourself some mediocrity, un-like this on TikTok, and get a good steak frites somewhere else.

Fries & steak were very good. Salad was disappointing. Hospitality part of this place wasn t the greatest. Our first server asked what we wanted to drink and how we wanted our steaks cooked. Rare, medium or well was all they offer we were told. After she took our order she never came back, there was many different people coming to our table so we did not have the same person serving us. A family got seated behind us a little while later and had a manager taking their order I think, and he was explaining that there was other side dishes & an option of a burger? Our server only asked us how we want the steak cooked and never mentioned anything else. Everyone seems all over the place and just unsure. Dessert cart is a great idea, never seen anything like it. Was too full to get dessert but it also threw me off seeing that dessert was 9$? Could be wrong but I think that s what I saw on the mini menu of alcohol. Not sure why a small sliver of carrot cake is the same price as Paris Brest. Needs improvement but the steak and fries were delish

5 stars for the food. 3 stars for the service. TLDR; good food, go early, be prepared to wait for fry refills Everything we had was delicious! In addition to the steak, fries, and salad, we added on the garlic bread ($9) and two desserts (key lime pie and chocolate mouse for $9 each) and would recommend all three. Blackberry spritz was good but they were out of the spices for the spiced margarita so I ordered a regular margarita which I would not recommend. We arrived at around 4:30pm (on a Friday) and there was no line so we took a walk around the block. When we came back at around 4:45, a line had started to form and it grew quickly. We were seated around 5:15 or so which wasn t bad at all but I can t imagine being at the end of that line as it obviously moved slower once the tables filled up. So definitely go early if you want to avoid a long wait as the line was even longer when we left. (They don t take reservations for parties under seven people). While we enjoyed the food, they would need to sort out some of the service issues before we return. Our server was nice (no complaints there) but we had to wait close to 30+ minutes for them to refill the fries at our table and by the time they had brought the second round of fries, my steak was then cold. A bit frustrating as they mentioned that the fries were unlimited several times while seating us etc. As a new restaurant, it is understandable that they are working out some of the kinks in the service but I would have appreciated some communication that there was a delay in the kitchen instead of just avoiding our table like they did.

Visiting NY for the first time. Seen this restaurant on my tiktok, I thought it was something cool to try. I felt like I wasn t treated the same way as others. I was told that it came with a salad, the steak and unlimited fries. So I ordered.. a  spiced margarita , not good! It didn t taste nothing like a margarita.. a couple sat next to me n were told about sides, different drinks I didn t see in the menu and even a burger.. why wasn t I told all that!? The fries are unlimited! The guy was passing by giving everyone double and even thirds He pass me by several times and didn t care to bring me some. I finally got his attention and he brought me ice instead of fries. I said May I get more fries. MORE !! And lastly another guy was passing by offering dessert to the tables. And guess what ?? Yup! I wasn t offered dessert. I was dressed presentable, makeup looked nice, I table manners. I wonder what it was that made me different to not deserve the same treat As everyone else.

Amazing!!! Service, food, ambiance,  EVERYTHING was great. The food was cooked properly and seasoned well. The restaurant went viral on Tik Tok so it was a little more crowded than they are used to, but they handled it exceptionally well. I didnt get any names but all the staff were very friendly and helpful!! I would definitely recommend, and definitely going back!
The food was great!!! The service was outstanding. Im going back for the dessert and dinner!!! Thank you for a nice evening!!

I highly recommend Skirt Steak. The food is excellent. As the name says, they serve skirt steak, but don t leave your vegetarian/vegan friends at home, because they also have an option of cauliflower steak that was absolutely delicious. The cauliflower steak was a large portion, excellently cooked with a bearnaise sauce, mushrooms, watercress, and seasoned well to bring all the flavors together (you can ask to have it without the bearnaise if you are vegan). This comes with bread, a green salad that had a delightful dressing, as well as bottomless shoestring fries. The servers come around with fresh fries all the time and you can have as much as you want. All of this for $28. Sides, drinks, and desserts are extra. I opted for the sauteed spinach, which was also very good. The desserts looked beautiful, but I was so full that I didn t get any this time.

Stopped by for a quick drink before heading to downtown for dinner around 5pm on Sat, as it didn t look busy at all at the time we walked in. The bar part is very lovely, bar tender service was on point, delicious drinks. Very  simple and organic decor. Bathroom is not well designed and inconvenient, for example, the can for feminine care products is under the sink which is hard to reach. My complaint was about the hostess and waiter communication & service. When we walked in, we specifically asked if we two could get a table for just drinks as we d like to have some room for our winter coats and a bday cake we just picked up nearby. We were led to a small table by the kitchen. The dining room was very very empty. Sat down and ordered drinks. While we were enjoying our drinks, waiter came over to take the dinner order. We politely listened to the dinner menu and told him we were here only for drinks. 2 mins later a manager look person came over and told us to move to the bar, said tables only reserved for dinner guests. And we were basically escorted to the bar immediately. For a busy dinner time, I would have no problem, wouldn t even try to ask for a table. But for a empty dining room like that, and a heads up was given when we walked in, that s just a joke.

Delicious! For those who know the concept of entrecote in Bordeaux or Lyon, its a bit the same: good meat, fresh fries and a delicious sauce ==> thats it! In the process of getting used to the service but we had a great time! Small downside: the wine is not great (Malbec)
review_translated_text: Delicious ! Pour ceux qui connaissent le concept de l entrecote a Bordeaux ou Lyon, c est un un peu pareil : de la bonne viande, des frites fraiches et une sauce delicieuse ==> le tour est joue ! En cours de rodage au niveau du service mais nous avons un passe un tres bon moment ! Petit bemol : le vin n est pas terrible (malbec)

review_text: Delicious food and great service! Highly recommend! Dessert cart had a great selection and interior of restaurant was cool and fresh. Will definitely eat here again on our next trip to NYC.
This is a highly recommended steakhouse!!  Atmosphere, craft beer, steak, dessert, service are all perfect!
Very good food and even better hospitality. Identical concept to the old Le Relais de Venise LEntrecote in Midtown but with a modernized vibe.

What a great concept - serve one thing and do it to perfection! Beautiful atmosphere and everything was delicious from the salad (on a chilled plate!) to the desert. Very pleasant, and attentive wait staff too. Hurry up and try it before the word gets around and it gets too crowded to get in!

Our first experience was wonderful. Ive never been to a restaurant that only has one main item on the menu but its steak so we went for it. For $28 each person gets a salad, skirt steak, and unlimited fries. Delicious. But the real icing on the cake, if you will, was the dessert cart pushing along to every table that got cleared. Like a fairy godmother popping in for your last wish. Anyways, we got 4 different desserts and each one was magnificent. Great food, great service. We will definitely be back.

Dropped in here while visiting recently and it was really great! Gotta love all these single option restaurants that do one thing REALLY well. Would certainly recommend for a more casual night out and a fantastic steak
Wonderful concept!  Prompt service and the fries were hot and crisp.   The steak was cooked perfectly, and the chef lets the meat be the star of the show!  Coconut cake for dessert awesome!
AMAZING! Food and service were perfect. The steak was tender, savoury and juicy. The fries were perfectly salty and crispy. The dressing was delicious. The desserts were spectacular.

We went on their second day open, and they were already off to a great start. $28 gets you warm bread, a sizable salad, unlimited shoestring fries, and a good portion of steak. The steak was nicely charred on the outside yet remained perfectly tender. We were convinced to order the Paris-Brest for dessert and thoroughly enjoyed it as well. My only complaint is that they tried pushing drinks on us too much, but otherwise the service was top notch.

Skirt Steak is unbelievably good. Unlimited hand cut, house made french fries, perfectly crisped and golden brown. Service is extremely quick and all the staff is extremely friendly. The atmosphere is very inviting and the entire restaurant feels very open and pleasant. The beer list is quite varied and feels curated quite well to pair with the meal. The first item to come out is the baguette served with sea salt butter. It was still warm when it came out, and absolutely delicious. The next is the salad, which has a delicious vinaigrette on it. Then the generous serving of steak comes out, which is cooked to absolute perfection. It comes served with bearnaise sauce on the side, which has peppercorns and tarragon. French fries are offered from serving bowl with unlimited refills! The next surprise was the dessert cart, which offered a wide selection of fantastic desserts. The Paris-brest was the best I have ever had, and the pannacotta was light and delicious! This is a very fairly priced meal and absolutely delicious. I will be returning soon!

Great meal! They start you off with fresh warm bread and sea salt butter. Then its salad, fries, and steak (plus yummy drinks, plus seasonal side vegetable options, plus dessert options). Yes, the fries can be refilled for free. Yes, the cocktails are on point. Come hungry, you will be satisfied. Good value for what you get.
